function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for optimal performance of the UV-C fluorescent source","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in mitigating contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research to determine the optimal operating parameters for the UV-C fluorescent system","Technologies":"UV-C fluorescent system with adjustable operating parameters","People":"Building occupants, especially in high-traffic areas","Owner":"HVAC system designers and operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate design of the UV-C system leading to high operating costs","Impact":"Increased expenses for maintaining and operating the UV-C system","Mitigation":"Collect measurements and diagnostic data on operation during summer and winter to inform the efficient and effective design of the UV-C system","Technologies":"UV-C system with adaptive operating parameters based on seasonal conditions","People":"Building owners, facility managers","Owner":"HVAC designers and engineers"},{"Description":"Insufficient consideration of indoor air parameters for different seasons","Impact":"Inconsistent indoor air quality and potential for disease propagation","Mitigation":"Conduct simulation calculations with an hourly step to determine the required indoor air parameters for summer and winter","Technologies":"HVAC systems with adaptive control for indoor air parameters based on seasonal conditions","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions","Owner":"HVAC system designers and operators"}]}
